metadata.title: GUZOSJO Women PU Leather French Chain Hat Black Beret Hat Causal Beanie Hat
features: MATERIAL--The beanie hat is made of quality cotton.Hand Wash Only

HAT CIRCUMFERENCE--56-58cm/22-22.8"; diameter:27.5cm/10.8", inside diameter about 13.5cm/5.25",With adjustable sweatband,you can adjust the sweatband to make it fit better,and fits most teens and adults.
CLASSIC & CASUAL--Romantic French Style,Cotton cloud hats offered in a vast array of colors that compliment your wardrobe and mood.
SOFT & EASY TO CLEAN--Quality cotton,soft,durable,breathable,skin-friendly and shiny.you can wipe the dirt place with a wet cloth.Hand wash for better,do not bleach,hang dry.Great for long-term use.

DIFFERENT COLORS AVAILABLE--This womens har has 7 different solid colors,goose pink hat,black hat,dark brown hat,camel hat ,red hat,light blue hat,and wine hat.Which available in match any outfit in your wardrobe on autumn, winter and spring.

FEEL FREE FOR CONTACTING-All GUZOSJO beret hats had done quality-checking many times.Feel free to contact us if the quality is not 100% satisfied with you,or if you have good suggestions for us,and we will try our best to solve it!
description: lightweight and easy to pack - comfortable durable and breathable to wear - Provide real warmth on a chilly evening - One size fit most adults & children over five year-old. - Best collocation for wardrobe, makes a great gift for anyone who's into fashion - Great for prom, homecoming, party or just for casual use
